title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 406.1 - Maintenance of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 406.1 - Maintenance of records

State Regulations
(a) The social services district shall
maintain all records necessary for proper and efficient operation of the social
services program. This includes records regarding application, determination of
eligibility, authorization and provision of social services, administrative
costs, and such statistical, fiscal and other records as are necessary for
reporting and accountability. (b) The social services district shall retain such records for an appropriate
period of time. Notes

406.1

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
